## Vector3.equalsWithEpsilon() method

Returns true if the current Vector3 and the given vector coordinates are distant less than epsilon

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
equalsWithEpsilon(otherVector: ReadOnlyVector3, epsilon?: number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  otherVector | <code>ReadOnlyVector3</code> | defines the second operand |
|  epsilon | <code>number</code> | defines the minimal distance to define values as equals |

<b>Returns:</b>

`boolean`

true if both vectors are distant less than epsilon
